current.des_page_about_1:
CoolStuff was founded in 2015 by Helen Osgerby, based on the simple premise that working with good people, making good things, made good sense. 
We have worked hard to source, collect and edit the best of British and Irish design carefully crafted things for the home that are designed and made on these shores.
current.des_page_about_2: Our products are designed with thought to their purpose and are made carefully. They require skill and knowledge from the designer and the maker, they might have a history, they might preserve a tradition, maintain a heritage or support an industry. Almost all have a story to tell.

settings.des_page_about_1: Want to join us? As the fastest growing online retailer in the UK, we are constantly striving to push boundaries and drive our business forward. We thrive in a culture of restlessness and innovation, which is why we are always on the lookout for talented and inspired people to join the team - people who share our vision, who can make a difference and who want to be part of something big.
